comments.author: Yuray Borushko
comments.body: So, if you're going to drink, make sure you have a designated driver or take a cab. It's not worth risking your life or someone else's. And if you're feeling tempted to act out inappropriately, whether it's towards someone else's spouse or in any other way, it's important to take a step back and think about the consequences of your actions.I think we all need to be more aware of how our choices affect those around us, especially our children. It's not fair for them to have to witness or endure the negative effects of our behavior. As responsible fathers and mothers, it's up to us to set a good example and create a safe, healthy environment for our families.
